articles.title: Fios customers in Boston and Providence lose FOX channels
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> A contract dispute with Cox Media Group has led to a blackout of local channels, including Fox affiliate Boston 25 News, as of Dec. 15.
